rows.label: tlk45350251_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Light rained down from the heavens
above, and another Divine Beast sank beneath
the clouds...

rows.label: tlk45350251_04_msg0002
rows.name:
When Superbia moved so close to
the World Tree, I expected the worst...

rows.label: tlk45350251_04_msg0003
rows.name:
But as it turns out, those light attacks
haven't actually hit us very hard.

rows.label: tlk45350251_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Perhaps they're holding back for fear
of damaging the World Tree itself?

rows.label: tlk45350251_04_msg0005
rows.name:
The Divine Beasts further away from the
World Tree do seem to be suffering
much greater losses...

rows.label: tlk45350251_04_msg0006
rows.name: It just makes me feel so powerless.

rows.label: tlk45350251_04_msg0007
rows.name:
All the research we've conducted
up until now...what was it all for?

rows.label: tlk45350251_04_msg0008
rows.name:
In the end, would we have been better
off just working on stronger weapons?
Would that have prepared us for this?

rows.label: tlk45350251_04_msg0009
rows.name: I don't know what to feel but regret...
